column4: X -configure fails with this error: http://pastebin.com/MBqYfNyR What do I do?
its a CD from the vmware site. (you are running in a vmware machine right)
then you should not be trying to use the vmware xorg module lol
oh, that, I don't know why that comes up
try running without an xorg.conf, what happens?
and it still doesnt work? pastebin you /var/log/Xorg.0.log file
your log is outdated, `sudo rm /var/log/Xorg.0.log` `startx` and then pastebin the new log
